CustomField.description: If intermediate objects in a grandparent rollup are technically children of the child object, use this field to make a comma separated list of the hops from one-to-many junction records to your ultimate "grandparent"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If intermediate objects in a grandparent rollup are technically children of the child object, use this field to make a comma separated list of the hops from one-to-many junction records to your ultimate "grandparent"
CustomField.label: One To Many Grandparent Fields
